headerStyles.title: Header Styles
headerStyles.collapseLongBioTooltip: Collapse a long bio down to 3 lines when your profile is first loaded. Clicking on a collapsed bio will expand it.

cardStyles.title: Card Styles
cardStyles.designGrouptooltipContent: Touch cards provide a smooth, tactile appearance to your cards. When using touch cards, the background color of the page will be used for the card. Some design options are not available when using touch cards.

SocialsAndSharing.enableAddContactTooltipAfter2: format. We will automatically generate your vCard using your profile picture, display name, email, phone number and any other links provided in the Socials field.
SocialsAndSharing.enableShareButtonTooltipAfter: icon to the top left of your page which will allow users to easily share your profile via the vCard format.
SocialsAndSharing.clickForQRCodeTooltip: With this enabled, you can click on your profile picture to bring up a QR code which links to your profile. Handy for sharing your profile with people you meet in person!
SocialsAndSharing.hideRaabetBrandingTooltip: Hide the "Made with rabet" logo at the bottom of your profile. You can optionally upload your own logo.

Metadata.title: RabetLink - Link in Bio Tool | Social Media Link Management

WhyUs.mainLabel: With our robust customization options and powerful block types, your profile will stand out from the noise. We're also more affordable than the competition, and a great choice for teams.

3stCard.title: More affordable

QRGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
QRGenerator.description: Create beautiful QR codes for any URL instantly. Free, fast, and easy to use.

form.title: Generate QR Code
form.description: Enter a URL to create a QR code

preview.title: QR Code Preview
preview.placeholder: Enter a URL above to generate your QR code

toast.fileTooLarge: Image size should be less than 5MB

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Generate QR codes instantly with our optimized generator

download.title: High Quality
download.description: Download your QR codes in high resolution PNG format

copy.title: Easy Sharing
copy.description: Copy QR codes as SVG or share URLs directly

customize.title: Customize QR Code
customize.description: Customize the appearance of your QR code

settings.title: QR Code Settings
settings.marginHelper: The quiet zone is the white space around the QR code. It's recommended to keep this enabled for better scanning.

explanation.title: About Error Correction
explanation.description: Error correction makes QR codes more reliable by adding redundant data. Higher levels can recover from damage, dirt, or poor scanning conditions, but result in larger QR codes. Choose based on your use case.

low.title: Low (7%) - Smallest size
low.description: Best for: Digital displays, clean indoor environments, business cards with high-quality printing

medium.title: Medium (15%) - Balanced
medium.description: Best for: General web links, social media profiles, most common use cases

quartile.title: Quartile (25%) - Good for damaged codes
quartile.description: Best for: Product packaging, outdoor signage, materials that may get dirty or worn

high.title: High (30%) - Maximum error correction
high.description: Best for: Industrial labels, medical equipment, critical applications, extreme conditions
